title: My MacBook Pro keeps lagging
body:
I need help with my MacBook Pro connection.

**Lag rises up to 900 ms and when loading the game ping goes up to the roof (650 when i used to get 120).** I don't know what to try fixing this or why it's happening (I have already tried shutting down all apps before playing, rebooting USB ports and wifi connections, and disabling my Thunderbolt port, which has been carrying issues for many users).

I get banned/repported for something I can't seem to do something about it. If someone can help me it would be great.

Thanks! :)

replies.body: Even macs can run into network issues, and in this case it sounds like your network can't maintain a connection to the game server.  I suggest going over each step in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help fix this up for good.  Make sure that you select the Mac box for instructions specific to your issue.  You can also test this in custom games to prevent penalties.  Let me know if you have any questions!

I have the same problem along with MANY other MacBook Pro users. Im on fiber optic internet and have absolutely no problem connecting to the internet. I only lag in the league of legends game. On my roommates windows laptop the game runs fine. This is an unsolved issue that has been around for a while. Riot has seemed to overlook this for a while and I speak for a huge chunk of the league population when I say... Riot, please fix your Mac client. Thank you
